Posts.Content:
i have been having terrible pains down below on my right side.not only during intercourse but tender to the touch.i wake up every morning so tired and my body just in pain and discomfort like when you have the flu.it takes me about
 an hour or two to start felling normal again.and not to mention the exagerated meaness. what could be my problem. i feel so lazy , n just wanna be left alone even from my husband. i thought i was pregnant at first ,but ive had three kids and it has never been like this. i just got the merina removed about
 a month ago because i thought it was the cause of my problems but now theyre starting to get really bad. does anyone hav an answer or suggest a forum i should go too...
Posts.Title: are there any forums on overian cancer?
